description.displayText: Dana has been assisting my mom since 2014 and is still employed with us as recently as 11/2020. We are so happy we found a caregiver that mom is comfortable with. Mom is now 96 and has gone through many changes but Dana has been with us all the way. She is a skilled professional and any family would be fortunate to hire her. Simply stated she is an Angel. Dana's assistance has been such a great help to our family. We actually consider her family! I am a registered nurse and would highly recommend Dana to any family looking for an individual that is caring, trustworthy, has the ability to recognize concerns or issues related to a loved one's health and emotional well being, whether the person is elderly or a child. Professional, dependable, caring are only a few of the fine words to describe Dana. We are blessed to have her taking care of our mom!

description.displayText: Dana has been working for us for 9+ months taking care of our beautiful mother. She is professional, dependable, caring, loving, knowledgeable and plays an integral part in the overall health and wellness of our mother and the balance of our family. She loves what she does and it is obvious in her work habits and care she takes at all times. She has my highest possible recommendation and I am happy to provide further details as needed.

description.displayText: I hired Dana to help out with giving my mom a bath. Dana has been great with the care of my mom. She is a very friendly & caring person. My mom is 86 years old and a diabetic. My mom is very comfortable with her. She enjoys her company and after her bath they have coffee and chat for a a little while. A very caring person
